content.webTitle: Escape's picks of the week: The adventures

fields.headline: The adventures
fields.bodyText: Intrepid Travel (01373 826611) has launched a series of 12 adventure holidays, including a 15-day introduction to Saudi Arabia (for £1,750pp excluding flights) that includes the Red Sea and Mecca, and also a colossal 28-night trip from Cairo to Casablanca that includes Algeria, Libya, Tunisia and Morocco for £2,570pp excluding flights.
